entry.def: A curriculum is all the different courses of study that are taught in a school, college, or university.

example.ex: There should be a broader curriculum in schools for post-16-year-old pupils...

example.ex: Russian is the one compulsory foreign language on the school curriculum.

entry.def: A particular curriculum is one particular course of study that is taught in a school, college, or university.
